text: when life gives you lemons preserve them
so you want unwaxed good preferably
organic lemons and you wash them well
slice them thinly and what I'm doing
here is just making a batch of eggplant
and peppers and olive oil and nothing
else so I have something to use my
preserved lemons for and just chop this
small the acidity of the lemon is going
to mix with the salt the thing I love
most about this is that it's so rare
that you get to eat a whole you know to
have an excuse to eat whole lemons as a
relish for simply cooked fish or chicken
it's really perfectly so this is my
three other lemons two parts sugar to
one part salt in this case two
tablespoons of sugar one tablespoon of
salt stir that up it's going to start
juicing right away you can leave it in
the bowl but it's kind of cute in a jar
perfect
wait twenty minutes a half an hour
you're ready to go give it a little bit
of a shake keep it in the fridge use it
when you need it
I got this really really tight but sweet
flavor quite delicious two big spoons
full say a quarter cup and there's your
there's your for instance dish nothing
wrong with playing eggplant and peppers
but the lemons do it this beautiful
highly acidic obviously but sweet also
great freshness that you can't get
